text: The publication of any document in the District of Columbia Statutes-at-Large, the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations, or the District of Columbia Register creates a rebuttable presumption:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-1541.

1973 Ed., § 1-1539.2.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-153, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-505.

DC CODE § 2-561

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: That it was duly issued, prescribed, adopted, or enacted; and
That all requirements of this subchapter have been complied with.
